about_the_game:
Listen to the Original Soundtrack for Animal Gods in full stereo sound. This OST highlights ghostly timbres and textures which transport players to another world. The collection of musical tracks was created to accompany the main Animal Gods game and includes ten original compositions by Peter Harmon.

Track List:

1 - Introit
2 - Home
3 - Gardens of Gwyn
4 - Halls of Eynd
5 - Coast of Syn
6 - Thistle and the Sky
7 - Requiem
8 - Monotheism
9 - Skyward Lullaby
10 - Animal Gods

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04.3 LTS
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel(R) Display Audio

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Yosemite
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
